testcase.name: nopcommerce frontend Add item to shopping basket
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/" website...................passed When I navigate to Desktops screen..........................................passed And I choose "Build your own computer"......................................passed And I click Add to cart button without choosing RAM size and HDD capacity...passed Then error messages "Please select RAM" and "Please select HDD" are displayed.passed When I choose 2 GB Ram and 320 GB HDD.......................................passed And I click Add to cart button..............................................passed Then "The product has been added to your " message is displayed.............passed
